## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/motionTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/motionTextureFormat] requests.

# motionTexture

**Instance Property**

The motion texture this frame interpolator evaluates.

## Declaration

```swift
var motionTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the usage and pixel format of the texture you assign to this property matches the texture usage [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/motionTextureUsage] requests and the pixel format that [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/motionTextureFormat] requests.
title: motionTexture
